Package views

Class Phase_View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • views.View
              • views.Phase_View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class Phase_View
extends View
    phase view class is implemented observer and extends JPrame from abstract view class for updating following fields 1. current player 2. current state 3. update state
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
